## These scripts were generated by chatGPT, ask chatGPT for help is the most efficient way to get the job done
## They will add overlay to video with logfiles, it's easy because UTC is everywhere in ham radio logs

## Generate overlay.ass from RxTxLog.txt and YYYYMMDD.adi
python gen_overlay_ass.py --mov .\input.mp4 --log .\RxTxLog.txt --video_start_utc "20260107 202627" --max_chars 26 --font_size 38 --out overlay.ass

## Add Rx/Tx log to video
ffmpeg -y -i IMG_5248.MOV -vf "subtitles=overlay.ass" -c:v h264_nvenc -preset p5 -cq 20 -c:a copy out.mp4

## Generate timestamp for each QSO(time of the first response from that caller), add them to video description on YouTube
python .\gen_youtube_timestamps_v2.py --mov .\output.mp4 --log .\RxTxLog.txt --video_start_utc "20260107 202627" --adi 20260107.txt

####Sample output
00:01:01 K7TCH
00:07:01 KJ7WLL
00:12:01 K6SH
00:12:01 K0TX
00:14:00 WM8Q
00:22:01 KC7YE
00:22:31 N7LAN
00:22:32 N7KB
00:33:31 KC9JUV
00:33:32 N9W
00:43:02 KG8DH
